name: Magoosh, Inc.
description: Developer of an online test preparation platform designed to erase examination anxiety from students. The company's platform provides test-prep services to students preparing for standardized examinations with the use of short-form video snippets allowing them to practice real problems using mobile applications and online study material, enabling students to prepare for their examinations in fast and easy manner, with the help of mobile and computer devices.
one_liner: Developer of an online test preparation platform designed to erase examination anxiety from students. The company's platform provides test-prep services to students preparing for standardized examinations with the use of short-form video snippets allowing them to practice real problems using mobile applications and online study material, enabling students to prepare for their examinations in fast and easy manner, with the help of mobile and computer devices.
